place: 2 Square Robiac, 192 rue de Grenelle VIIe
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Opfer: Can you please ring me up (Ségur 95–20) as I should like to know whether you are free or would like to do my son soon. He is free at present as he has suspended his singing lessons owing to false diagnosis of his voice and so could sit for you when you like. I hope you have some good news from America Sincerely yours James Joyce
